mapper.sql: id,sapNo, completeMachineVersion, completeMachineName, createPerson, updateTime, revisedRecord
mapper.select: select completeMachineName from tbl_business_completemachine where sapNo = #{keys}

select count(1) from tbl_business_completemachine where sapNo=${keys}
and completeMachineName like CONCAT('%',#{completeName},'%')
mapper.insert:

sapNo,
completeMachineName,

mapper.update:
update tbl_business_completemachine
sapNo = #{sapNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
completeMachineName = #{completeMachineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
completeMachineVersion = #{completeMachineVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createPerson = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
revisedRecord = #{revisedRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_business_completemachine set sapNo = #{sapNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, completeMachineName = #{completeMachineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, completeMachineVersion = #{completeMachineVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createPerson = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, revisedRecord = #{revisedRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
